description: In the Middle Ages, schools divided their studies into the trivium (grammar, logic, and rhetoric) and the quadrivium (arithmetic, geometry, music, and astronomy). The trivium was considered more basic and easier. Quadrivia is like trivia, only more serious and harder. Quadrivia Vocabulary Quiz will challenge your vocabulary skills.
name: Quadrivia Vocabulary Quiz
shortDescription: Quadrivia is like trivia, only more serious and harder. Quadrivia Vocabulary Quiz will challenge your vocabulary skills.
